io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.executors

Class JdkScheduledThreadPoolExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.AbstractExecutorService
      • java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor
        • java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor
          • io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.executors.JdkScheduledThreadPoolExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Executor, ExecutorService, ScheduledExecutorService

    public class JdkScheduledThreadPoolExecutor
extends ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor
    Executor that support uncaucht exceptions and interruptable threads.
    Version:
    2.0.2.0 2015-04-09 09:04:05
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel
